extendedInfo.description: Rack âem up, road warriors. Virtual Pool, the worldâs best selling 3D pool simulation, is now available for Android phones and tablets. So real that we guarantee it will improve your real pool game! All the best features from the award winning PC version are included. Enjoy Virtual Pool on your Android anywhere you go!Now optimized for S4 and other 1080p devices!Games9-Ball, 8-Ball, 6-Ball, Straight Pool, 10-Ball and Rotation.Easy to Use InterfaceThe player interface is intuitive and a snap to use. Aim cue by using your finger to rotate left or right. Shoot by touching the cue, pull back with your finger and flick forward. The faster you move your finger the harder the cue ball is hit. Quick PlaySet up and play your buddies or a computer opponent at any one of 6 different pool rooms. You get to choose! Play pool on a 4x9 championship or 3.5x7 bar table.Computer OpponentsThe VP Mobile computer adversaries know how to play pool! The better players can really stroke it, but luckily for you, the poor players are not any better than the sucker at your local bar. There are 128 computer opponents of varying skill levels, so you'll always have somebody to play. Play any skill level of computer opponent, from sucker to pool shark.Hit the RoadCareer mode starts you out as a rookie in the Garage. You're not alone, because Curly, the ultimate road player is there to guide you. Work your way through 6 different pool rooms by beating the Room Boss and earning enough cash to travel to the next room. Each room has a different player and table. As you progress in your career the competition gets tougher and tougher and the bets go up! You must beat Curly in the beach house for the big money to complete your career.

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: This game is the best way to loose hours of your life without realising it! If you don\'t do any other games, do this one! Amazing, keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: stuey rhino

reviews.title: Played this game for years on PC, but....
reviews.comment: Fantastic game on PC but on android devices such as Sony experia ray and Pipo Chinese tablet I can\'t advance because sometimes when I clearly win a game the comp says I lost and takes my money....... WHY !
reviews.author: Peter Clarke

reviews.title: Good, BUT...
reviews.comment: Pressing home, or receiving calls will immediately exit the game with no possibility of resuming... Any mobile app should have this basic feature, please fix!!  Moreover, I can\'t do masse/jump shot as there\'s no way to adjust the stick elevation angle.
reviews.author: Roland Bu\'ul\303\266l\303\266

reviews.title: Lags on breaks and faster shots
reviews.comment: Had this for PC ages ago and was happy to see it available for my nexus 4. The very first break off and it lagged massively making a horrible noise. Seen if run ok on an S3 so am a bit gutted to say the least! Seems to have issues with the break off shot and hard shots in general.
reviews.author: Allan McNair

reviews.comment: Excellent plays like the real game
reviews.author: Geoff Dixon

reviews.title: Still the best
reviews.comment: Have played this since an old PC version, but can you fix the bug that happens if you pause a career - when you later resume and win, it doesn\'t register and you don\'t get the cash.
reviews.author: Martin Smith

reviews.title: Learn
reviews.comment: I always gives 5 star , great graphic,  great experience, Learning simple & smooth game in any device
reviews.author: parag jhobalia

reviews.title: Poor compared to other OS\'s
reviews.comment: I have this game for the pc, iphone, iPad and now the HTC one.   I am very disappointed in the game . The game lags horifically; even after changes my settings to low detail.
reviews.author: Mani Calamanco

reviews.title: Best pool game I\'ve found for my GS3.
reviews.comment: Excellent graphics and realistic game play.   One problem I\'ve encountered , though,  is that on several games of 9-ball,  the 9 ball disappears.   The game continues  as if the ball is on the table but you can\'t see it.   I will give it a 5 star rating if this is fixed.
reviews.author: Tom Pearson

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Had some issues on my Nexus 4, but the developer was quick to sort them out. This is as good as pool gets on mobile.
reviews.author: Nick Soper

reviews.title: HTC One major lag
reviews.comment: Love the game but it lags on my phone. Runs smooth for 2 secs then freezes 2secs...  Runs fine for a while after reboot. Friend has HTC One and it\'s the same on theirs.
reviews.author: Graeme Gibson

reviews.title: Around since the days of DOS
reviews.comment: This game has been around since the days of DOS on the PC. Its always had great graphics and play.
reviews.author: Stephen Charchuk

reviews.comment: Best pool game around. Would love to be able to skip through the CPU\'s shots though :-)
reviews.author: mick love

reviews.title: So laggy
reviews.comment: Please fix this, it was very good on my desire S but on my one it lags all the time. Please read the comments as your average rating is coming down!
reviews.author: geordiediver

reviews.title: Seriously Laggy
reviews.comment: Played smooth on my t-bolt, loved it, but now on gs3 it\'s so laggy it\'s unplayable. Please fix!
reviews.author: James Vogel

reviews.title: New Review
reviews.comment: Change my mind. It\'s a brilliant Game. RECOMMEND to everyone. Every penny is fully Worth.
reviews.author: VIJAY ODEDRA

reviews.title: Loved it on pc love it now.
reviews.comment: Thank you.  The only feature I wish it had was to show your pocketed balls like you would see in a coin op bar pool table.
reviews.author: Alvahoke Silverleaf

reviews.title: Best pool sim
reviews.comment: The controls, camera views and physics are the best by far.
reviews.author: Andrew Padley
